text: You jing ren zhong you de ren, jiaru ni xintuo ta yi da dui huangjin, ta hui ru shu hai gei ni; tamen zhong you de ren, jishi ni xintuo ta yi mei jinbi, ta ye bu hui hai gei ni, chufei ni yizai suoyao, zhe shi yinwei tamen shuo:“Women shixin yu wenmang zhe [a wei bo ren] shi bu shou zebei de.” Tamen guyi jie an la de mingyi shuohuang.
